Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 71st/Dorchester
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via 71st, Dorchester,67th, Cottage Grove, and 71st due to, street blockage at 71st/Dorchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 71st, Dorchester,67th, Cottage Grove, and 71st due to, street blockage at 71st/Dorchester.

Allow extra travel time.
